title: Im stuck on honor level 2,help me pls
body: Hello,i was wondering why i am stuck in honor level 2 while all my friends have got it before me , i dont remember that i got banned for toxicity or if i was you could me but can u check how much do u i still need to grind so i can get to honor lvl 3 and higher,or is it maybe a bug,tnx for your help

replies.body: Your rate of honor growth can slow down if you have some less than honorable match.es  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our PB team can look into your account directly and offer some better context to help you specifically.  See you there!

You can read the [Honor FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148) how to lvl up your honor rank.

But remember, honors from premades/friends counts 0!

You can rank up by getting 0 honors, but slowly. Honors from non-premades gives you a boost for the lvl up.

We can't help, it's based on average honors and total honors or something, and queueuing with people and having them honor u gives VERY little toward the next honor level Sorry bro {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
